author: julianfoad
msg: Issue 952: Pass the new value as stdin to the pre-revprop-change hook script.
(run_hook_cmd): Accept a file handle to be used for stdin.
(svn_repos__hooks_pre_revprop_change): Write the new value to a temporary
file and pass that as stdin for the hook.
NULL as a stdin file for the hook.

author: julianfoad
msg: Correct the error code used to report an unknown EOL-style property value.

author: julianfoad
msg: * configure.in: Change the advertised option name for experimental libtool

author: dlr
msg: Use chomp instead of chop in the example code (preferred for
removing newlines at the end of a string).
